job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of predictive models, which falls under the core task of creating and training machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions predictive models for user behavior, which is a key aspect of traditional ML model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of predictive models for user attributes based on content consumption, fitting the definition of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This task involves data processing and management within a big data environment, aligning with data engineering principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building data pipelines and monitoring systems, which is a core part of data engineering and management for ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, â€¦)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates responsibilities related to DevOps practices, including infrastructure as code and CI/CD, which are key to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the entire lifecycle of model development: analysis, experimentation, validation, implementation, and presentation of results.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This task is about building data infrastructure and pipelines, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building an ML Ops platform, which is a core MLOps task.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes integrating services with other teams, a typical software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: je werkt mee aan onze web applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in building web applications, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: 80% is bouwen aan de data stack, web applicaties & incrementele verbeteringen
job_tasks.justification: This highlights a significant portion of the role dedicated to building data stacks and web applications, which are software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: 20% van de tijd werken aan features en modellen
job_tasks.justification: This specifies time dedicated to working on features and models, directly relating to model development.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies indicates collaboration and communication within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to dev and business teams is a clear communication task.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
soft_skills.justification: Taking ownership and accountability directly maps to the Innovation & Ownership category.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for advertising and user behavior. While there are mentions of data pipelines, MLOps, and web applications (Software Engineering tasks), the core of the role is model development. There is no mention of Generative AI specific technologies like LLMs, RAG, or prompt engineering. Therefore, it aligns best with a Core ML Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear about the responsibilities and the types of models being developed. The technologies mentioned are also specific and align well with traditional ML. The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is clear, and the ad firmly places itself in the traditional ML domain.
